html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

If there's one kitchen must-have to make your weeknights easier, it's a pressure cooker. A good pressure cooker can transform meal planning and it can make your weeknight cooking routine easier—and healthier—than you ever thought possible. Whether you're a pressure-cooking pro or you're looking to dabble as a New Year's resolution, Black Friday is the time to jump on the pressure cooking bandwagon.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

In the world of pressure cookers, the Instant Pot reigns supreme as the ultimate option for home cooks. It consistently ranks as a top performer by the experts and has a loyal cult following that's crazy about its versatility and its ease of use. If that's not enough, Instant Pot has also entered the world of air fryers with their impressive Vortex air fryer line. 

Whether you're looking to eat healthier, cook faster or just breathe new life into your weeknight dinners, now is the time to score an Instant Pot pressure cooker or air fryer. We've scoured top sellers like Amazon, Bed Bath and Beyond, Macy's and more to find the best Black Friday Instant Pot deals of 2021. 

The best Instant Pot Black Friday deals

  • Instant Pot 6-Quart Air Fryer Lid at Kohl's for $49.99 (Save $40)
  • Instant Vortex 6-Quart 4-in-1 Basket Air Fryer at Macy's for $69.95 (Save $30)
  • Instant Pot 9-in-1 Duo Plus 6- or 8-Quart Pressure Cooker at Bed Bath and Beyond for $59 or $79.99 (Save $60)
  • Instant Pot Pro 10-in-1 6-Quart Pressure Cooker at Amazon for $79.95 (Save $50.04)
  • Instant Pot Duo Plus 9-in-1 at Amazon for $79.95 (Save $60.04)
  • Instant Pot 6-Qt. Stainless-Steel Vortex Plus Basket Air Fryer at William Sonoma for $89.95 (Save $40)
  • Instant Pot Vortex Plus 10-Quart 7-In-1 Air Fryer and Oven at Macy's for $89.95 (Save $50)
  • Instant Pot 6-Quart 6-in-1 Basket Air Fryer with Window for $99.99 (Save $30)
  • Instant Pot Duo Crisp 11-in-1 6-Quart Electric Pressure Cooker with Air Fryer Lid at Target for $99.99 (Save $50)
  • Instant Pot Ultra 80 Ultra 10-in-1 8-Quart Pressure Cooker at Amazon for $114.99 (Save $45)
  • Instant Pot Duo Crisp 11-in-1 8-Quart Electric Pressure Cooker with Air Fryer Lid at Amazon for $119.99 (Save $80.04)
  • Instant Pot Omni Plus 18-Liter Toaster Oven and Air Fryer at Kohl's for $139.99 (Save $110)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
